title: Hunter
description: Jason has always wondered whether he was the only Tracker around. He’s about to get his answer. Now working as a Private Investigator, Jason gets involved in a missing person’s case that hits a little too close to home. Sam has always worried about his brother. He’s also always known more than Jason tells him. The last two years have been peaceful, but he knows it’s only a matter of time before that changes. Jason and Sam have always been close, but both have secrets. And Sam’s secret may be the key to bringing down the Hunter.
author: Adrianne Lemke
